simulation

Class Events

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulation.Events
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Events>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Evaporation, Move, Observation

    public abstract class Events
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Events>
    Abstract Class where an event of the simulation is defined (to be added in the PEC) All the events have the event time attribute in common, and so when the object of this class is created, the event time is schedule (for the given time). It class must be extended to define a specific event (for example, move, evaporation, observation, reproduction, etc.), with the associated effect produce by a specific event.
    Author:
    Pedro Mendes, Rui Livramento, Francisco Costa
